name: CYBERBLADE
Description: basic effect: Deal 2 damage to 1 target on your square.with shadowstep: Move 1 square before or after the basic effect.with slice and dice: Deal 2 damage to a different target on your square. The shadowstep may be used before or after this effect.Notes: Combining all effects allows you to move onto a square and whack 2 people; or whack somebody, move, and whack somebody else; or whack 2 people and then mov
